849a20d9-18af-451f-9aaf-557562d00980.description: Earners of the Trusted Trainer Credential have demonstrated that they provide the highest quality training experiences for learners. Based on independently verified customer feedback, the earner has proven superior training delivery excellence, consistent achievement of targeted learning outcomes, and the highest levels of training professionalism.
849a20d9-18af-451f-9aaf-557562d00980.name: Trusted Trainer Credential

alignments.name: Course Conductor Trusted Training Radar® Accreditation Standard
alignments.description: The Trusted Training Radar® Accreditation Standard is a rigorous statistical methodology that rates the trustworthiness of trainers and training vendors. Scores are influenced by aggregated data gathered independently from training evaluations, interviews with previous clients, online customer surveys and verified customer review analytics.

badge_template_activities.title: Course Conductor analysis of verified customer feedback including client interviews, client reviews, client references, learner evaluations and/or customer reviews.
Trainer must be in accordance with the requirements set forth in the Course Conductor Trusted Training Radar® Accreditation Standard
And / or Course Conductor observation and evaluation of training delivery.
